sect1.title: Package installation
sect1.para: Requires workflow and bcms and their prerequisites.

listitem.para: Option 1: use a custom tarball which includes those modules. In that case, the custom tarball will have a file install.xml in its root directory, so that installing OpenACS normally will produce a simulation server.
Option 2: Install acs-core, and then rely on the automated install to do the rest. Go to /acs-admin/install/install and install simulation. The rest should happen automatically.
